Improvements.Improvement: Add null checks for session and payload
Improvements.Description: Currently, the method does not check if the session or payload parameters are null. This could lead to a NullPointerException. To prevent this, the method should return false if either session or payload is null.

Improvements.Improvement: Extract sub-session creation into a separate method
Improvements.Description: The creation of a SubSession object within the for loop is a separate concern that can be extracted into its own method. This would make the code more maintainable and easier to read.
